entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then cloudy with a few rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate.
